title: Celebrity Cruises joins Dîner en Blanc
text:
Celebrity Cruises joins Dîner en Blanc Adv: 
Jul 22, 2015 Adv: 
MIAMI and MONTREAL, Canada - As the annual secret affair known as "Le Dîner en Blanc" pops up in select cities around the globe this year, modern luxury cruise brand Celebrity Cruises will be bringing a taste of its award-winning onboard experience to Dîner en Blanc attendees. 
"Just as Celebrity Cruises offers award-winning globally inspired cuisine, sexy and stylish spaces, and intuitive service on our stunning ships, Le Dîner en Blanc consistently offers unforgettable evenings of elegance, beauty and magic around the globe, and there is a natural synergy between our brands," said Lisa Lutoff-Perlo, President and CEO, Celebrity Cruises. "We are thrilled to have a strong presence at Dîner en Blanc events in key cities in 2015, and to bring special elements of Celebrity's modern luxury to everyone who attends these incredibly visual, chic events." 
Bystanders will witness groups of guests all dressed in white gathering at specific rallying points all across the city. Guided by Dîner en Blanc volunteers, these groups will then converge on one of the city's most beautiful settings, which is revealed only when guests arrive. Every guest brings their own gourmet feast, table, chairs and table setting. Over the course of the evening, they will eat and celebrate amid music, entertainment and dancing. 
Celebrity will reveal a number of exciting event experiences to Le Dîner en Blanc attendees at events in Boston, Chicago, Dallas, Los Angeles, New York City, San Francisco, and Washington DC in 2015. The sponsorship also offers Le Dîner en Blanc members in those cities the opportunity to enter a sweepstakes to win a seven-night Celebrity cruise for two to the Caribbean. Celebrity is also providing the prize for a contest for Dîner en Blanc attendees in those cities and additional U.S. cities, which includes submission of a photo of the attendee's 2015 Dîner en Blanc table setting and design, which will be judged by Dîner en Blanc on style, creativity, and elegance. The winner will receive the ultimate modern luxury escape: a grand prize of a 10-11-night Celebrity cruise for two in Europe plus roundtrip, coach-class airfare from a major US gateway, and $250 onboard credit. 
"We are incredibly excited that Celebrity Cruises is bringing its modern luxury dynamic to our guests in these very special cities," said Sandy Safi, Co-Founder, Dîner en Blanc International. "Not only is Celebrity giving our guests opportunities to win cruises on their beautiful ships, but they are also bringing some unique touches to our events. We look forward to a continued relationship with Celebrity as a result of this year's activations."
